text: Her swytelað on þissum gewrite hu ælfric biscop wille his are beteon þe he under Gode geernode & under Cnute kyncge his leofue laforde & siþþan hæfð rihtlice gehealdan under Haralde cyncge.
Þæt is þonne ærest þæt ic gean þæt land et Wilrincgawerþa into sancte Eadmunde for mira saule & for minas lafordas swa ful & swa forð swa he hit me to handa let.
& ic gean þæt land æt Hunstanestune be æstan broke & mid þan lande et Holme into sancte Eadmunde.
& ic wille þæt þa munecas on Byrig sellan syxtig punde for þan lande et Ticeswelle & et Doccyncge & þæt þerto geherað.
& ic gean Leofstane dæcane þæt land et Grimastune swa ful & swa forð swa ic hit ahte.
& ic gean mine cynelaforde HaraldeIImarc gol.
& ic gean mire hlefdigen an marc gol.
& gelæste man ÆgelriceIIIIpund mire fatfylre.
& sela man mine cnihtas þa mina stiwardas witanXXXXpunda & fif pund into Elig & fif pund into Holm & fif pund Wulfwarde muneke minne mæge & fif pund Ælffæh min sæmestre.
& ic wille þæt man sella þæt land et Walsingaham swa man derast mage & gelesta man þæt feoh swa ic gewissod hæbbe.
& ic wille þæt man selle þæt land et Fersafeld swa man derast mæge & recna man iungere Brun an marc gol & mid þan laue scytte man mina borgas.
& ic gean Ælfwine minan preoste et WalsingahamXXXakera et Eggemera & Uui prouast habba þone ofaræcan.
& ic gean Ædwine muneke þa mylne et Gæssæte þe Ringware ahte.
& ic gean Ælfwig preoste þæt land et Rygedune þe ic bohte to Leofwenne.
& ic gean þæt myln þe Wulnoð ahte into sancte Eadmunde .
& ic gean Sibriht þæt land þe ic gebohte on Mulantune.
& ic gean þæt fen þe þurlac me sealde into Ælmham þa preostas to foddan.
& ic gean into Hoxne þa preostas an þusend werð fen.
& ic gean þæt fen þe ælfric me sealde into Holme.
& ic gean þon hage binnon Norðwic for mire saule & for ealra þe hit me geuðon into sancte Eadmunde.
& ic gean þan hage into sancte Petre binnon Lunden.
& ic gean iungre Brune þæt healfe þusend fen.
